Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2015, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2015, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2015, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2015, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2015, hitting .374 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2015, hitting .550 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won MVP in 2015, hitting .335 with 43 HR, 115 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Cincinnati on 5/30/2017...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Detroit on 7/25/2017 (Going to DET: CF Carlos Lopez. Going to STL: 1B George Stebbins, C Jason Burr, 3B Mark Wright)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2017, hitting .370 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Colorado on 6/4/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/13/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $25,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2019, hitting .417 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2020, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2020, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/10/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $7,950,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 4/7/2023...
